parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where id == "{Workspace}"
| project resourceGroup

parameters.name: GiBperday
parameters.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated > startofday({TimeRange:start}) and TimeGenerated < startofday({TimeRange:end})
// Only look at chargeable Tables
| where _IsBillable == True
| summarize
TotalGBytes =round(sum(_BilledSize/(1024*1024*1024)),2)
by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)//, Solution=tt
| summarize round(avg(TotalGBytes),2)

parameters.name: Help
parameters.label: Show Help
parameters.description: This will show some help information to help you understand the page you are on

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
| where id has "{Workspace}"
| extend state = trim(' ', tostring(properties.provisioningState))
		,sku   = trim(' ', tostring(properties.sku.name))
        ,skuUpdate = trim(' ', tostring(properties.sku.lastSkuUpdate))
		,retentionDays = trim(' ', tostring(properties.retentionInDays))
		,dailyquotaGB  = trim(' ', tostring(properties.workspaceCapping.dailyQuotaGb))
| extend dailyquotaGB = iif(dailyquotaGB !=-1.0, dailyquotaGB,"Not set")
| extend skuUpdate    = iif(strlen(skuUpdate) > 0, skuUpdate,"Unknown")
| extend sentinel     = iif(toint(retentionDays) < 90,"If you have Sentinel, you can change your retention to 90days (free)?","")
| project ['Workspace Name']=id, ['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, location, ['Data Retention(days)']=retentionDays, ['Last known SKU update']=skuUpdate, ['Daily Data Cap']=dailyquotaGB, ['License']=sku, ['Notes'] = sentinel

content.json: # Overview

This section shows the general status of data ingestion in the selected workspace.

Please select the *Subscription* and *Workspace* you wish to view, and the *TimeRange* to define the scope.

### Columns explained
- **Table name**: the name of the Log Analytics workspace table. The list of tables is updated dynamically.
- **Table size**: the total size of the data stored in the table for the specified time range.
- **Table entries**: the total number of events stored in the table for the specified time range. 
- **Size per entry**: Average size of each event.
- **Is billable**: indicates if the table is billable or free (True/False).

Select a table name from the list in order to filter the charts below.

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| summarize Entries = count(), Size = sum(_BilledSize), last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)), estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)  by _TableName, _IsBillable
| project ['Table Name'] = _TableName, ['Table Size'] = Size, ['Table Entries'] = Entries,
          ['Size per Entry'] = 1.0 * Size / Entries, ['IsBillable'] = _IsBillable
| order by ['Table Size']  desc
content.title: {Workspace:name} workspace status for {TimeRange:label}

labelSettings.label: Table entries
labelSettings.comment: Count of Rows in the Table

content.query:
union withsource = _TableName *
| where '{Table}' == 'All Tables' or _TableName == '{Table}'
| make-series TableSize = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
| mvexpand TableSize to typeof(real), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime) limit 1000
| project TimeGenerated, ['{Table}'] = TableSize
content.title: {TimeRange:label}: number of events

content.query:
union withsource = _TableName *
| where '{Table}' == 'All Tables' or _TableName == '{Table}'
| make-series TableSize = sum(_BilledSize) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} 
| mvexpand TableSize to typeof(real), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime) limit 1000
| project TimeGenerated, ['{Table}'] = TableSize
content.title: {TimeRange:label}: table volume

content.query:
union withsource= _TableName *
| where '{Table}' == 'All Tables' or _TableName == '{Table}'
| summarize count()  by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), Type
| project Type, TimeGenerated, count_
content.title: {TimeRange:label}: number of events, by table (Time Brush enabled)

content.query:
union withsource = _TableName *
| where '{Table}' == 'All Tables' or _TableName == '{Table}'
| summarize count()  by bin(TimeGenerated, {tbMthlyUsage:grain}), Type
| project ['Table name'] = Type, ['Time generated'] = TimeGenerated, ['Number of events'] = count_
content.title: Number of events over selected time: {tbMthlyUsage:label}

content.json: ## Events per second (EPS)

parameters.name: EPStimerange
parameters.label: Select EPS time range
parameters.description: Used to calculate Events Per Second (EPS) over a selected time range

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TimeReceived  {EPStimerange:Label}
| summarize count() , Size = sum(_BilledSize) by bin(_TimeReceived, 1m), Type, _IsBillable
| extend counttemp =count_ / 60
| summarize 
           ['Average Events per Second (eps)'] = avg(counttemp), ['Minimum eps']=min (counttemp),
           ['Maximum eps']=max(counttemp)
  by ['Table Name']=Type
| order  by ['Average Events per Second (eps)'] desc
content.title: {EPStimerange:label}: events per second (EPS), by table

labelSettings.label: Lowest EPS
labelSettings.comment: Lowest EPS measured over the specified time period

labelSettings.label: Highest EPS
labelSettings.comment: Highest EPS measured over the specified time period

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where _TimeReceived  {EPStimerange:Label}
| summarize count() by bin(_TimeReceived, 1m), Type, DeviceVendor
| extend counttemp = todouble(count_ / 60)
| summarize ['Events per Second (eps)'] = avg(counttemp) by DeviceVendor
| order  by ['Events per Second (eps)'] desc
content.title: {EPStimerange:label}: average EPS in CommonSecurityLog (CEF), by device vendor

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where _TimeReceived  {EPStimerange:Label}
| summarize count() by bin(_TimeReceived, 1m), Type, _ResourceId
| extend counttemp =count_ / 60
| summarize ['Events per Second (eps)'] = avg(counttemp) by Computer = _ResourceId
| order  by ['Events per Second (eps)'] desc
content.title: {EPStimerange:label}: average EPS in CommonSecurityLog (CEF), by computer

content.query:
Syslog
| where _TimeReceived  {EPStimerange:Label}
| summarize count() by bin(_TimeReceived, 1m), Type, _ResourceId
| extend counttemp =count_ / 60
| summarize ['Events per Second (eps)'] = avg(counttemp) by Computer = _ResourceId
| order  by ['Events per Second (eps)'] desc
content.title: {EPStimerange:label}: average EPS in Syslog, by computer

content.query:
union withsource = _TableName *
| where '{Table}' == 'All Tables' or _TableName == '{Table}'
| where _TimeReceived  > startofday(ago(7d))
| summarize count()  by bin(_TimeReceived, {TimeRange:grain}), Type
| project Type, _TimeReceived, count_
content.title: Total events collected over time, by table name, for the last 7 days

content.query:
union withsource = _TableName *
| where '{Table}' == 'All Tables' or _TableName == '{Table}'
| summarize count()  by bin(_TimeReceived, {TimeRange:grain}), Type
| project Type, _TimeReceived, count_
content.title: Total events collected over time, by table name, for the last 30 days

content.json:
---
## Last event received

parameters.label: Last log received threshold
parameters.description: Select the last log recived threshold, to filter the table below

content.title: Last data received, by table

labelSettings.comment: When did the last record arrive?

labelSettings.comment: When did the last record arrive?

items.name: query - 2 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.json: # Data collection anomalies view:

In this section you will be able to detect anomalies in the data collection process. 
Each tab presents anomalies for a particular table.
The anomlies are calculated using the **series_decompose_anomalies()** function that returns an **anomaly score**. [Learn more about this function](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/data-explorer/kusto/query/series-decompose-anomaliesfunction).

#### Parameters:
- **AnomaliesTimeRange**: This time picker applies only to the data collection anomalies view.
- **SampleInterval**: The time interval in which data is sampled in the given time range. The anomaly score is calculated only on the last interval's data.
- **PositiveAlertThreshold**: This value defines the positive **anomaly score** threshold. Accepts decimal values.
- **NegativeAlertThreshold**: This value defines the negative **anomaly score** threshold. Accepts decimal values.

parameters.name: AnomaliesTimeRange
parameters.label: Time Range
parameters.description: This time picker applies only to the data collection anomalies view.

parameters.name: SampleInterval
parameters.label: Sample Interval
parameters.description: The time interval in which data is sampled in the given time range. The anomaly score is calculated only on the last interval's data.

parameters.name: PositiveAlertThreshold
parameters.label: Positive Alert Threshold
parameters.description: This value defines the positive anomaly score threshold. Accepts decimal values.

parameters.name: NegativeAlertThreshold
parameters.label: Negative Alert Threshold
parameters.description: This value defines the negative anomaly score threshold. Accepts decimal values.

content.query:
union withsource = _TableName *
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value}  by _TableName
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project ["Table Name"] = _TableName, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=count_[-1], Score = score[-1]
content.title: Click on the table name to drill down

content.query:
union withsource = _TableName *
| where _TableName == '{Table}'
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value}
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| project-away anomalies, score
| render timechart
content.title: Anomaly graph for the selected table

content.query:
union withsource= _TableName *
| where _TableName == '{Table}'
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value}  by _TableName, _ResourceId, SourceSystem
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project _ResourceId, SourceSystem, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], score = round(todouble(score[-1]),2), Trend, Baselaine = baseline
content.title: Anomalies by source system and resource

content.query:
Usage
| make-series Sum = sum(Quantity) on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value}  by DataType
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Sum, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project TableName = DataType, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Sum[-1], Score = score[-1]
content.title: Click on the table name to drill down

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} 
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| project-away anomalies, score
| render timechart

CommonSecurityLog
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} by DeviceVendor
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project ['Device Vendor'] = DeviceVendor, ['Expected counts']=baseline[-1], ['Actual count']=Trend[-1], Score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline
content.title: Detections by vendor

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} by DeviceVendor, DeviceProduct, _ResourceId, Computer
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project DeviceVendor,  DeviceProduct, Machime = _ResourceId, ["Computer Name"] = Computer, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline
content.title: Detections by vendor, product and machine

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} 
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| project-away anomalies, score
| render timechart

SecurityEvent
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} by _ResourceId, Computer
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project Machine = _ResourceId, ["Computer Name"] = Computer, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline
content.title: Detections by machine

content.query:
Syslog
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} 
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| project-away anomalies, score
| render timechart

Syslog
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} by _ResourceId, Computer, SourceSystem
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project Machine = _ResourceId, ["Computer Name"] = Computer, ['Source System'] = SourceSystem, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], Score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline
content.title: Detections by machine

content.query:
AzureActivity
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} by _ResourceId, ResourceGroup
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project ['Resource group'] = ResourceGroup, ['Resource'] = _ResourceId, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], Score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline
content.title: Detections by resource - select a row to filter the graph

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceID}' or '{ResourceID}' == "All"
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} 
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| project-away anomalies, score
| render timechart

AzureDiagnostics
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} by ResourceType
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project ['Resource type'] = ResourceType, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], Score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline
content.title: Detections by resource type - select a row to filter the graph

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == '{ResourceType}' or  'All' == '{ResourceType}'
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} 
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| project-away anomalies, score
| render timechart

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == '{ResourceType}'
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} by _ResourceId, ResourceType
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project ['Resource'] = _ResourceId, ['Resource type'] = ResourceType, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], Score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline
content.title: Detections by resource

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} 
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)

| render timechart

OfficeActivity

| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)

| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project ['Office workload'] = OfficeWorkload, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], Score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline

content.query:
AWSCloudTrail
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} 
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| project-away anomalies, score

AWSCloudTrail
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value} by AWSRegion
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Trend, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project ['AWS region'] = AWSRegion, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=Trend[-1], Score = score[-1], Trend, Baseline = baseline
content.title: Detections by AWS region

content.json: # Agent information view

### Make sure to select your machines' enviroment: 
- Azure managed machines - show statistics for Azure VMs or Azure Arc managed servers
- All machines - show statistics for all machines, including non-Azure servers reporting via the Microsoft Monitoring Agent (MMA)

#### This tab shows you information about the health of the Log Analytics agents installed on your various machines, whether Azure VM, other cloud VM, on-premises VM, or physical. You can see the following information:
- Location
- Heartbeat status
- Available memory and disk space
- Action audit

### You can filter any of these displays by log type (table name) and by specific machines.

parameters.name: VMfilter
parameters.label: Machine name filter
parameters.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TableName in ({TableName})
| where _ResourceId contains "virtualmachines"
| where _ResourceId != " "
| summarize by value = _ResourceId
| extend label = extract(".*/([^/]+)",1, value)

content.json: Select a location to filter the display below.

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({VMfilter})
| summarize dcount(Computer) by RemoteIPCountry, Computer
content.title: Computers' location

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({VMfilter})
| where RemoteIPCountry == "{regionName}" or "{regionName}" == "All"
| summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(Computer) by ["OS"]=iff(isempty(OSName), OSType, OSName)
content.title: Computer OS

content.json: ## Computer heartbeat tracking: {TimeRange}

parameters.name: UnhealthyCriteria
parameters.label: Unhealthy definition
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"1m", "label":"1 minute without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"5m", "label":"5 minutes without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"30m", "label":"30 minutes without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"1h", "label":"1 hour without heartbeat", "selected":true },
    { "value":"2h", "label":"2 hours without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"8h", "label":"8 hours without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"1d", "label":"1 day without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"2d", "label":"2 days without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"7d", "label":"7 days without heartbeat", "selected":false }
]

content.json: Select a computer from the table to measure the heartbeat and latency of a specific computer. The latency is measured by comparing the result of the **ingestion_time()** function to the value of the **TimeGenerated** property.

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({VMfilter})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where RemoteIPCountry == "{regionName}" or "{regionName}" == "All"
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend State = iff(LastHeartbeat < ago({UnhealthyCriteria}), 'Unhealthy', 'Healthy')
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - LastHeartbeat
| extend ["TimeAgo"] = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')
| join (
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| extend Packed = pack_all()
) on Computer
| where TimeGenerated == LastHeartbeat
| join (
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| make-series InternalTrend=iff(count() > 0, 1, 0) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {UnhealthyCriteria} by Computer
| extend Trend=array_slice(InternalTrend, array_length(InternalTrend) - 30, array_length(InternalTrend)-1)
| extend (s_min, s_minId, s_max, s_maxId, s_avg, s_var, s_stdev) = series_stats(Trend)
| project Computer, Trend, s_avg
) on Computer
| order by State, s_avg asc, TimeAgo
| project ["_ComputerName_"] = Computer, ["Computer"]=strcat(' ', Computer), State, ["Environment"] = iff(ComputerEnvironment == "Azure", ComputerEnvironment, Category), ["OS"]=iff(isempty(OSName), OSType, OSName), ["Azure Resource"]=ResourceId, ["Time"]=strcat(' ', TimeAgo), ["Heartbeat Trend"]=Trend, ["Details"]=Packed, ["Computer Region"] = RemoteIPCountry
content.title: {TimeRange:label}: all agent heartbeat data

content.query:
Heartbeat  
| where Computer startswith "{ComputerName}"
| summarize ['Heartbeats per hour'] = count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1h)
content.title: Heartbeats per hour: {ComputerName}

content.query:
Heartbeat  
| where Computer startswith "{ComputerName}"
| extend E2EIngestionLatency = todouble(datetime_diff("Second",ingestion_time(),TimeGenerated))/60 
| extend AgentLatency        = todouble(datetime_diff("Second",_TimeReceived,TimeGenerated))/60 
| summarize avg(E2EIngestionLatency),avg(AgentLatency) by bin(TimeGenerated,1h) 
| project TimeGenerated, ['End-to-end latency'] = avg_E2EIngestionLatency, ['Agent Latency'] = avg_AgentLatency
content.title: Average heartbeat latency: {ComputerName}

content.query:
Operation
| where tolower(_ResourceId) in ({VMfilter})
| where Computer != "" and Computer == "{ComputerName}" or "{ComputerName}" == "All"
| summarize Failers = countif(OperationStatus == "Failed" or OperationStatus == "Failure"), Errors = countif(OperationStatus == "Error"), Warnings = countif(OperationStatus == "Warning") by Computer
| order by Failers, Errors, Warnings
content.title: Operation status

content.query:
Operation
| where tolower(_ResourceId) in ({VMfilter})
| where Computer != "" and Computer startswith "{ComputerName}" or "{ComputerName}" == "All"
| where Computer == "{SelectedComputer}" or "{SelectedComputer}" == "All"
| summarize count() by OperationStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Operation status over time for computer: {SelectedComputer}

content.json:
---

## Computer and agent activity status 
Based on Log Analytics **Operation** table

content.query:
Operation
| where tolower(_ResourceId) in ({VMfilter})
| where Computer != "" and Computer startswith "{ComputerName}" or "{ComputerName}" == "All"
| where Computer == "{SelectedComputer}" or "{SelectedComputer}" == "All"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, OperationStatus, OperationCategory, Detail, Solution
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Operations full info over selected time: {TimeBrush:label}

content.json:
---

## Machine resources status

content.query:
Perf
| where tolower(_ResourceId) in ({VMfilter})
| where Computer != "" and Computer == "{ComputerName}" or "{ComputerName}" == "All"
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and
(CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory" or // the name used in Linux records
CounterName == "Available MBytes") // the name used in Windows records
| project TimeGenerated, CounterName, CounterValue, Computer
| make-series Trend = avg(CounterValue) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from ago(30d) to now() step 1d by Computer
| project Computer, ["Current Available Space MBytes"] = todouble(Trend[-1]), Trend
| order by ["Current Available Space MBytes"] asc
content.title: Available memory in MB

content.query:
Perf
| where tolower(_ResourceId) in ({VMfilter})
| where Computer != "" and Computer == "{ComputerName}" or "{ComputerName}" == "All"
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or // the object name used in Windows records
ObjectName == "Logical Disk" // the object name used in Linux records
| where CounterName == "Free Megabytes"
| project TimeGenerated, CounterName, CounterValue, Computer, InstanceName
| make-series Trend = avg(CounterValue) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from ago(30d) to now() step 1d by Computer, InstanceName
| project Computer, ["Current Available Space MBytes"] = todouble(Trend[-1]), Trend, InstanceName
| order by ["Current Available Space MBytes"] asc
content.title: Available disk / filesystem space in MB

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.label: Table name filter
parameters.query:
union withsource= _TableName *
| where Computer != ""
| summarize by ["Table name"] = _TableName

parameters.name: VMfilter
parameters.label: Machine name filter
parameters.query:
union withsource= _TableName *
| where _TableName in ({TableName})
| where Computer != ""
| summarize by value = Computer
| extend label = value

content.json: Select a location to filter the display below.

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where Computer in ({VMfilter})
| summarize dcount(Computer) by RemoteIPCountry, Computer
content.title: Computers' location

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where Computer in ({VMfilter})
| where RemoteIPCountry == "{regionName}" or "{regionName}" == "All"
| summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(Computer) by ["OS"]=iff(isempty(OSName), OSType, OSName)
content.title: Computer OS

content.json: ## Computer heartbeat tracking: {TimeRange}

parameters.name: UnhealthyCriteria
parameters.label: Unhealthy definition
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"1m", "label":"1 minute without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"5m", "label":"5 minutes without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"30m", "label":"30 minutes without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"1h", "label":"1 hour without heartbeat", "selected":true },
    { "value":"2h", "label":"2 hours without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"8h", "label":"8 hours without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"1d", "label":"1 day without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"2d", "label":"2 days without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"7d", "label":"7 days without heartbeat", "selected":false }
]

content.json: Select a computer from the table to measure the heartbeat and latency of a specific computer. The latency is measured by comparing the result of the **ingestion_time()** function to the value of the **TimeGenerated** property.

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where Computer in ({VMfilter})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where RemoteIPCountry == "{regionName}" or "{regionName}" == "All"
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend State = iff(LastHeartbeat < ago({UnhealthyCriteria}), 'Unhealthy', 'Healthy')
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - LastHeartbeat
| extend ["TimeAgo"] = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')
| join (
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| extend Packed = pack_all()
) on Computer
| where TimeGenerated == LastHeartbeat
| join (
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| make-series InternalTrend=iff(count() > 0, 1, 0) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {UnhealthyCriteria} by Computer
| extend Trend=array_slice(InternalTrend, array_length(InternalTrend) - 30, array_length(InternalTrend)-1)
| extend (s_min, s_minId, s_max, s_maxId, s_avg, s_var, s_stdev) = series_stats(Trend)
| project Computer, Trend, s_avg
) on Computer
| order by State, s_avg asc, TimeAgo
| project ["_ComputerName_"] = Computer, ["Computer"]=strcat(' ', Computer), State, ["Environment"] = iff(ComputerEnvironment == "Azure", ComputerEnvironment, Category), ["OS"]=iff(isempty(OSName), OSType, OSName), ["Azure Resource"]=ResourceId, ["Time"]=strcat(' ', TimeAgo), ["Heartbeat Trend"]=Trend, ["Details"]=Packed, ["Computer Region"] = RemoteIPCountry
content.title: {TimeRange:label}: all agent heartbeat data

content.query:
Heartbeat  
| where Computer startswith "{ComputerName}"
| summarize ['Heartbeats per hour'] = count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1h)
content.title: Heartbeats per hour: {ComputerName}

content.query:
Heartbeat  
| where Computer startswith "{ComputerName}"
| extend E2EIngestionLatency = todouble(datetime_diff("Second",ingestion_time(),TimeGenerated))/60 
| extend AgentLatency        = todouble(datetime_diff("Second",_TimeReceived,TimeGenerated))/60 
| summarize avg(E2EIngestionLatency),avg(AgentLatency) by bin(TimeGenerated,1h) 
| project TimeGenerated, ['End-to-end latency'] = avg_E2EIngestionLatency, ['Agent Latency'] = avg_AgentLatency
content.title: Average heartbeat latency: {ComputerName}

content.query:
Operation
| where Computer in ({VMfilter})
| where Computer != "" and Computer == "{ComputerName}" or "{ComputerName}" == "All"
| summarize Failers = countif(OperationStatus == "Failed" or OperationStatus == "Failure"), Errors = countif(OperationStatus == "Error"), Warnings = countif(OperationStatus == "Warning") by Computer
| order by Failers, Errors, Warnings
content.title: Operation status

content.query:
Operation
| where Computer in ({VMfilter})
| where Computer != "" and Computer startswith "{ComputerName}" or "{ComputerName}" == "All"
| where Computer == "{SelectedComputer}" or "{SelectedComputer}" == "All"
| summarize count() by OperationStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Operation status over time for computer: {SelectedComputer}

Perf
| where Computer in ({VMfilter})
| where Computer != "" and Computer == "{ComputerName}" or "{ComputerName}" == "All"
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or // the object name used in Windows records
ObjectName == "Logical Disk" // the object name used in Linux records
